summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VCB (Vacuum Circuit Breaker) report template. All 6 VCB-specific sections are implemented and working: Service Checks, Contact Resistance Test, Insulation Resistance Test, Breaker Timings Test, Operational Checks, and Functional Checks. Each section has Enable/Disable toggle functionality. Fixed a backend bug where report creation failed due to duplicate 'report_no' keyword argument.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed backend bug in test_reports.py: Added report_data.pop('report_no', None) before creating TestReport to avoid 'multiple values for keyword argument' error
VCB template correctly includes No. of Poles (3P/4P dropdown) and Frequency (Hz) fields in equipment_fields
All 6 VCB sections have Enable Section toggle checkboxes that correctly show/hide section content
VCB edit form correctly loads all saved data including vcb_service_checks, vcb_contact_resistance, vcb_insulation_resistance, vcb_breaker_timings, vcb_operational_checks
context_for_next_testing_agent: VCB report template fully implemented with 6 sections. ACB reports verified working (regression test passed). The edit URL path for VCB is /projects/project-reports/service/vcb/{reportId}/edit. Section toggles work correctly to show/hide section content.

features_verified.acb_regression: PASS - ACB reports still work correctly

tests: VCB new report form loads - PASS
Equipment Details shows No. of Poles and Frequency - PASS
Edit form loads with data - PASS
